name: Grow and Smile - For Balling
description: This is a pinball + CG casual game. In the game, you can use the keyboard direction keys or the mouse to control the moving direction of the spring board. Control the ball to smash all the bricks to pass the level. The props dropped by breaking the bricks may enhance the attack power of the ball or weaken the attack power of the ball. , and may also lose blood. Passing a level can accumulate a certain amount of experience points, which is a necessary element in exchange for exquisite CG.
